summary: VEHICLE DOESN'T COME EQUIPPED WITH THE DOOR AJAR WARNING  FEATURE.  CONSUMER FEELS THIS IS UNSAFE, CAUSE WHILE DRIVING WITH THEIR INFANT IN THE BACK SEAT, THE PASSENGER SIDE DOOR WAS AJAR, AND CONSUMER WASN'T AWARE OF IT.  THE CHILD COULD OF FELL OUT OF THE  VEHICLE. PLEASE PROVIDE MORE DETAILS. TS
